Improve this resume bullet:
""Hi UpworkersI'm in urgent need of adding some creative flair to a rather dull 8 page LinkedIn optimization guide. This has originally been written in word format and is not particularly engaging.What am I looking for?1. A complete refresh of the design. The content can remain the same for now, but I want something that is slick, clean and modern, ideally with some infographics to make the document engaging to my customers2. I would want an editable version as each guide is customized for the client so I would need opportunity to be able to populate some of the sections.3. I don't really have a company name or brand currently, so it's just the colours, imagery and look that I wish to create for now. I am very keen on something modern, slick and minimalist. I don't want corporate.Examples of styles I like are attached as well as the actual document itself. The visual is really important to me to ensure a premium feel is given.The only request I have is to have the first page as a single page allowing for the client's name to be inputted as a little gift from myselfI want thoughtfulness, creativity and initiative on document that is currently very dull indeed.I don't have a fixed price, but am willing to pay more for someone who can really showcase me something they have done similarly and can do this gig with minimum supervison.Many thanks!!WillPosted On: February 20, 2024 14:27 UTCCategory: Graphic DesignSkills:Infographic, Publication Design, Presentation Design, Information Design, Graphic Design, Layout Design, Adobe InDesignSkills: Infographic, Publication Design, Presentation Design, Information Design, Graphic Design, Layout Design, Adobe InDesignCountry: United Kingdom""

Improve this resume bullet:
""Expensify is a team of generalists developing today's leading expense management tool. Maintaining our reputation as an innovative leader in the world of finance requires an incredibly reliable and secure system for processing financial transactions. Accordingly, we primarily leverage time-tested languages, but we're looking to unify our front-end across platforms. For this, we're leveraging React Native and are looking toward the community on Upwork to help solve a variety of problems, both big and small, related to this migration.Please see the GitHub issue for full details: github.com/Expensify/App/issues/36869Your Proposal:- You *must* post a proposal for how you will fix this issue in the GitHub issue linked above.- Your proposal should include a technical explanation of the changes you will make. You are not required to submit the final solution or code along with your proposal.- Your proposal will be reviewed.- If your proposal is accepted, you should post the proposal in Upwork and you will be hired for the job.- AFTER your proposal is accepted in Upwork and you have accepted the offer, you may submit the code to implement your solution. To submit the code, go to the Expensify/App GitHub repo where you'll create a fork of our codebase. You'll create a branch on that fork, and when your code is ready for review, you'll create a pull request in our repository to merge your code into our codebase. Include screenshots and confirmation that you have tested the pull request on all platforms. Our engineers will review the code, and approve and merge when the code meets our requirements.Please review our Contributor Guidelines before submitting a proposal - github.com/Expensify/App/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md**Important:** As documented in our CONTRIBUTING.md, payment amounts are variable, dependent on any regressions your work causes.Budget: $500Posted On: February 20, 2024 14:26 UTCCategory: Mobile App DevelopmentCountry: United States""
Delivered expensify, team, generalists-based improvements by transforming ad-hoc tasks into repeatable, automated processes that improved productivity and accuracy for clients.

""I have 3 excel files, containing 11,000 unique serial numbers (called EANS). EANS are unique IDs and are assigned to a specific item.The EANS are supplied to us by a licensing authority, and when an EAN is assigned to a product we have to register it back with the licensing authority.We have allocated approximately 1200 of these numbers to a group of products and we need to check for accuracy that we have not made any errors before we upload the data back to the authority.The EANS supplied to us are random non sequential numbers.I now need to:1) confirm that the EANS we have been allocated match the EANS we have assigned to products.2) identify any eans assigned to a product that have been done in error, and aren't on our master list.3) identfy any duplicated EANS - ie used twice for different products.4) build batch files so we can upload to the licensing authorityPlease provide any relevant experience on this. Improve this resume bullet:
""We are looking for an experienced web designer/developer to redesign the layout, appearance, and text content for our website's home page (analysisplace.com).We are a small company that sells a single app. We sell subscriptions to a Software as a Service Office add-in we created. It performs document automation between Excel and Word or PowerPoint.Our home page is in need of an overhaul. We believe it should look more like our competitors. We also want to combine our existing home page and our main product page into a new/improved home page, that will hopefully improve SEO and increase traffic. We would also like advice on structure, layouts, SEO, and menus, of our other main pages.Our CMS is DNN (DotNetNuke), but it is not necessary to know DNN. It is based on Bootstrap.Website design should be standard Bootstrap CSS. Nothing advanced is required. But we are expecting a significant improvement over what we have.We do not expect you to create new images, diagrams, or videos of our product. We can create those, if needed.Text also needs to be re-written/re-structured to be easier to understand and more compelling. Most of the ideas are already on the website, but needs to be improved.PROJECT TASKS/DELIVERABLESReview our website and understand our productReview competitor websites (we will provide a list of 5)Call/emails to discuss redesign ideasProvide and discuss new layoutCreate new content (based on our existing content)Create the new page (html/css/BootStrap) on your own site or in a temporary page on our DNN site.Provide recommendations on the layout/organization of our other main pagesSKILLS REQUIREDWeb page designHTML/CSS/BootstrapWeb content writingDNN CMS would be beneficial, but not requiredFuture work, may include improvements of other pages on the website.Budget: $300Posted On: February 20, 2024 14:25 UTCCategory: Web DesignSkills:Landing Page, Website Redesign, Web Design, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Web Content StrategySkills: Landing Page, Website Redesign, Web Design, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Web Content StrategyCountry: United States""

Environment Setup:- Install prerequisites: Docker, Docker Compose, Ruby, Rails.- Clone the OpenDAX repository from GitHub.2. Exchange Configuration:- Update `config/app.yml` with exchange details.- Set currencies, markets, and trading pairs in `config/seed/currencies.yml`, `config/seed/markets.yml`, and `config/seed/trading_pairs.yml`.3. Database Setup:- Initialize the database and load seed data.- Configure settings in `config/database.yml`.4. Wallet Integration:- Set up wallet services for supported cryptocurrencies.- Configure wallet settings in `config/seed/wallets.yml`.5. User Interface Customization:- Modify front-end components for branding and design.- Use React components and CSS for customization.6. Exchange Deployment:- Use Docker Compose to deploy services.- Test functionality and ensure all services are running correctly.7. Security Implementation:- Set up SSL certificates and two-factor authentication (2FA).- Regularly update software for security patches.8. Launch and Monitoring:- Open exchange to the public and onboard users.- Monitor performance, security, and user activity.Configuring Wallets and Trading1. User Registration and Wallet Creation:- Users sign up and automatically get a wallet for each supported cryptocurrency.2. Depositing Money:- Integrate a payment gateway for fiat currency deposits.- (Note: Cryptocurrency deposits are not supported in this setup.)3. Purchasing Digital Assets:- Users place buy orders for digital assets.- The matching engine executes trades, and assets are transferred to the user's wallet.Customizing for Digital Assets with Escrow (DAE)1.
